description: Sylvi is an ed-tech company based in the UK that combines social learning with AI, creating a unique platform that leverages a strong community of early adopters and validation from prestigious institutions such as Epsom College. The company is focused on scaling its business and opening up B2B channels.
funding_stage: I have a business that I want to scale
business_model: B2B and B2C SaaS, leveraging partnerships with educational institutions and a community-driven product roadmap.. USP: Sylvi is different as it combines social learning with AI in ways competitors haven't achieved. Our defensibility stems from a strong community of early adopters providing invaluable feedback for our product roadmap, plus validation from prestigious institutions such as Epsom College opening up the B2B channel.

key_metrics.Business Stage: I have a business that I want to scale
